channel.title: Make-Over-Mage?
channel.description: Well, I just put in the Make-Over-Mage with my autospawn.cfg, but I found it awkward that once I got there, when you click on him, it already put up the interface that you can change your chars looks with. The only problem was, when you click on the arrows, nothing happens, but when you exit the interface, your char changed its looks. So what is happening, is the interface is not showing how you would look. If anyone knows how to fix this please tell me how? I really want this as a part of my server =/

item.title: Make-Over-Mage?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I made this for you. but if you wants only donators to use it.
else use the last.

if(NPCID == 599){
if(donator == 1){
sM(“Chose a new char look.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}
}
if(donator == 0){
sM(“I’m sorry i only help donators with there look”);
}

if(NPCID == 599){
sM(“Chose a new char look.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Make-Over-Mage?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Well, I just put in the Make-Over-Mage with my autospawn.cfg, but I found it awkward that once I got there, when you click on him, it already put up the interface that you can change your chars looks with. The only problem was, when you click on the arrows, nothing happens, but when you exit the interface, your char changed its looks. So what is happening, is the interface is not showing how you would look. If anyone knows how to fix this please tell me how? I really want this as a part of my server =/
